description.message: Download links on a web page with popular downloaders such as FlashGet, FlashGet Mini, Thunder and Mini Thunder.

tip_no_link.message: There are no links on this page

tip_special.message: This is a special page. Unable to use Download Helper on this page.

tip_no_downloader.message: No downloaders detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.

tip_mini_flashget_and_thunder.message: FlashGet Mini and Mini Thunder detected. To enable Download All feature, please install FlashGet or Thunder.

disable.message: Disable right-click download menu and use default Chrome context menu
